title: Trying to register for a Korean account?
body:
I am trying to register for a Korean account but I get this pop up and don't know what it says. Can anyone help?

I am currently in Korea and am using my Korean phone to register.

[Photo](http://oi66.tinypic.com/o52q12.jpg)

EDIT:

For anyone with same issue, according to this scanning app 

the First picture says "Error Call [1577-1006]"

Second picture says "Authentication did not go off normally."

Doesn't really help much but whatever.

replies.body: i cant login in korean server haha

DB query error [Contact: 1577-1006]

Authentication was not successful.

Unfortunately, I can't read Korean. :(

If you require further assistance with this, I recommend reaching out to our [**Korea Player Support team**](http://leagueoflegends.co.kr/Customer/qna_login.php).

If you have any other questions, let me know.
Unfortunately I need a Korean login to go past that link. Thanks though =)
can you copy paste the text into google translate?
Unable to highlight to copy paste =(
